meta.title: Maksym Hnatyshyn || Front end developer
meta.description: My name is Maksym Hnatyshyn, I am a Front end developer with experience working with JavaScript, React, Next.js and TypeScript. I am a graduate of the Western Ukrainian National University, majoring in Software Engineering.
meta.keywords: Maksym Hnatyshyn, Front end developer, JavaScript, React, Next.js, TypeScript, Software Engineering, Western Ukrainian National University, freelance, responsive websites, web applications, API integration, user interfaces, TailwindCSS, GitHub, Python, Docker, MongoDB, PostgreSQL

0.title: Solar Panel Installation Company Website
0.description: A modern website for a company specializing in solar power plant installation. The site features a responsive interface.

1.title: Weather Forecast App
1.description: A weather forecast application built with Next.js, which displays real-time weather information using an external API. The app features a clean and responsive UI, styled with TailwindCSS, and optimized for SEO. Deployed on Vercel for seamless hosting and performance.

2.title: Draggable Tabs Component
2.description: This is a demo website built as a test task featuring a tab component with the following functionality: Tabs can be rearranged via drag-and-drop, and their order persists after page reload. Tabs can be pinned in place. Tabs that don't fit into the visible area of the container are shown in a dropdown menu with scrolling. When the screen width changes, tabs that no longer fit are moved to the dropdown and vice versa ‚Äî they return to the main area. Each tab is assigned a unique URL, and switching between tabs triggers navigation to the corresponding URL.

3.title: Collaborative To-Do App with User Roles
3.description: A task management web application built as a test project. It features user registration, authentication, and session management via tokens. Users can create and manage to-do lists, add tasks with titles and descriptions, mark them as completed, and invite collaborators with different access levels. Each list supports two roles: Admin (full access) and Viewer (can only view and mark tasks as done). The app has a clean UI and supports seamless multi-user interaction.
